node.title: BitTorrent Live (and BitTorrent News), now available for OS X.
node.excerpt: Download and tune-in to BitTorrent News’ coverage of the Republican National Convention BitTorrent Live, the multichannel OTT app, is now available for  OS X (Apple laptops and desktops). Download the DMG file here. One of the key channels on BitTorrent Live is BitTorrent News. If you’re not watching BitTorrent News’ coverage of the RNC, you’re…

node.title: BitTorrent Live: Multichannel App for Live and Linear Programming Unveiled at INTX
node.excerpt: BitTorrent Live solves provisioning and lag time problems for live online broadcasting; Features free tier of channels spanning news, sports, music, tech, and youth culture.

node.title: OTT News Launches As Test Case for Live Streaming
node.excerpt: *Update, OTT News is now available for iOS and tvOS directly from the App Store.  Android users can still download from the Google Play Store.
